parameter.name: id
parameter.description: The identifier of the deal to be updated

parameter.name: currency
parameter.description: The currency of the deal. Accepts a 3-character currency code

parameter.name: userId
parameter.description: The Identifier of the user who will be marked as the owner of this deal

parameter.name: personId
parameter.description: The Identifier of the person this deal will be associated with

parameter.name: organizationId
parameter.description: The Identifier of the organization, the deal will be associated with

parameter.name: stageId
parameter.description: The Identifier of the stage this deal will be placed in a pipeline

parameter.name: status
parameter.description: The status of the deal, possible values are Open, Won, Lost and Deleted

parameter.name: lostReason
parameter.description: The message about why the deal was lost, only to be used when the status is Lost

parameter.name: visibility
parameter.description: Visibility of the deal. If omitted, visibility will not be changed, possible values are 0,1 and 2

parameter.name: customFields
parameter.description: JSON Object specifying the values for the deal's custom fields created in the account, keys for the object are the 40-character hashes assigned for the respective custom fields

parameter.name: prettyOutput
parameter.description: If the prettyOutput is specified as 1, will return an indented response of the output

parameter.name: fields
parameter.description: The array of fileds to be returned in the output
